animeTitle: Chiisana Ahiru no Ooki na Ai no Monogatari: Ahiru no Kwak
animeDescription: Alfred J Kwak (Dutch, it takes place in Holland) lost his parents, brothers and sisters when he was young. He was raised by a mole. The series covers the life of Alfred from the day he is born. In his life Alfred tries to help all sorts of animals all over the world. The series are meant to entertain children and teach children about life, covering historical aspects like WW II.   (Source: AniDB)
